title: Area Volume linear and exponential functions part - a

content.description: Let R be the region enclosed by the graphs of y=ex ,y=x and the lines x=0 and x=4 .
content.question: Find the area of R.

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x
